text.Tom Paech: So these mechanical monstrosities, they don't just kill people, they feed off them?

text.Counselor: Not just people. All organic matter.

text.Tom Paech: Every living thing - dissolved into nutrients? Millennia of evolution - liquefied?! The miracle of life reduced to - bloody bio-fuel?!
Who did this? Faro? That arsehole! Is he here?!
Tell him Tom Paech wants a word!
YOU GET TED FARO IN HERE!
